spec_data.Name: vavoom
spec_data.Description:
Vavoom is an enhanced open-source port of Doom. The "vavoom" meta-package
installs vavoom-engine, and launchers / menu-entries to download and play
doom-shareware, heretic-shareware, hexen-demo and strife-demo.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 09:23:55 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Enhanced Doom, Heretic, Hexen and Strife source port - meta package
